text: Lebohang K. Moleko is a Lesotho diplomat. He has served as Lesotho's Ambassador to the United States and as Permanent Representative to the United Nations in New York. He served as President of the UNICEF Executive Board at the international level in 2004.Officers of the UNICEF Executive Board 1946–2014, UNICEFExecutive Board, UNICEF ==References== Category:Ambassadors of Lesotho to the United States Category:Chairmen and Presidents of UNICEF Category:Permanent Representatives of Lesotho to the United Nations Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Lesotho officials of the United Nations
title: Lebohang K. Moleko
